headline.print_headline: Elder-Care Challenges Prompt Tech Executives to Create Startups, Apps
headline.main: Elder-Care Challenges Prompt Tech Executives to Create Startups, Apps

docs.lead_paragraph: For years, Google Inc's commerce chief, Stephanie Tilenius, held a demanding job and helped oversee the medical care of her parents, an experience that led her to leave the Internet search giant in 2012 and start a company to help patients combat chronic disease.
docs.snippet: For years, Google Inc's commerce chief, Stephanie Tilenius, held a demanding job and helped oversee the medical care of her parents, an experience that led her to leave the Internet search giant in 2012 and start a company to help patients combat...

headline.print_headline: Diabetes Drug Gains Approval for Treatment of Obesity
headline.main: Diabetes Drug Gains Approval for Treatment of Obesity

docs.abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves Novo Nordisk diabetes drug liraglutide as a treatment for obesity, first injectable drug approved for weight loss; drug will be marketed under brand name Saxenda.
docs.lead_paragraph: The first injectable drug approved for weight loss will be marketed for overweight adults who have weight-related health problems.
docs.snippet: The first injectable drug approved for weight loss will be marketed for overweight adults who have weight-related health problems.

headline.main: How Losing a Job Can Be Bad for Your Health

docs.lead_paragraph: Previous studies have found a link between high unemployment and improved health indicators, like weight loss. But that may be changing.
docs.snippet: Previous studies have found a link between high unemployment and improved health indicators, like weight loss. But that may be changing.

headline.print_headline: FDA Clears Novo Nordisk's Weight Loss Drug Saxenda
headline.main: FDA Clears Novo Nordisk's Weight Loss Drug Saxenda

docs.lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration has approved a Novo Nordisk diabetes drug as a treatment for obesity. It's the first injectable drug approved for weight loss.
docs.snippet: The Food and Drug Administration has approved a Novo Nordisk diabetes drug as a treatment for obesity. It's the first injectable drug approved for weight loss.

headline.print_headline: Sugar Season. It’s Everywhere, And Addictive.
headline.main: Sugar Season. It’s Everywhere, and Addictive.

byline.original: By JAMES J. DiNICOLANTONIO and SEAN C. LUCAN

docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by cardiovascular scientist James J DiNicolantonio and Prof Sean C Lucan warns of dangers posed by increased sugar consumption during the holiday season; cites extensive evidence that sugar is significantly addicting, fact that is being exploited by the food industry; calls for consumers to substitute whole, natural foods for sweet industrial concoctions.
docs.lead_paragraph: The sweet craving that once offered a survival advantage now works against us.
docs.snippet: The sweet craving that once offered a survival advantage now works against us.

headline.print_headline: Food From Home Fails Nutrition Test
headline.main: Why Cafeteria Food Is the Best

docs.abstract: Many parents undoubtedly think they are doing the best for their children by having them bring lunch from home instead of eating the lunches served in school. But recent studies clearly prove them wrong.
docs.snippet: Many parents undoubtedly think they are doing the best for their children by having them bring lunch from home instead of eating the lunches served in school. But recent studies clearly prove them wrong.
